channel.title: Shops don't work anymore? [317 Delta]
channel.description:
So, I've had shops working the whole time I've had this server, and just recently... as in 10 minutes ago, I haven't been able to get them to work. All I did was spawn in some NPCs and change some text in client.java. Anyone know what's wrong? Thanks.
More information: When I click on them ("Talk"), they usually open up a shop. Nothing happens now.
Edit: I'm really not sure... I replaced my client and loads of other files... still not working... Oh, ::starter doesn't work anymore... I'm just gonna redo it... fml. Delete if necessary.

item.title: Shops don't work anymore? [317 Delta]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“yodudes, post:7, topic:477419”][quote author=Christmas_tree link=topic=595612.msg4193804#msg4193804 date=1357211702]
And if you replace it with the previous method you have, does it work?
[/quote]
I completely replaced Client.Java, and a good bit of other files, still nothing works… I’m not sure, I’ll figure it out later… or I’ll just completely replace it and only copy over a few important files. Then I can get a better idea of which one is screwing it up.[/quote]
Or you could just undo your changes.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops don't work anymore? [317 Delta]
item.dc:creator: @yodudes yodudes
item.description:
@yodudes wrote:

Here’s the whole part. I’m using Delta

[code]if (server.shopHandler.ShopSModifier[MyShopID] > 1) {
for (int j = 0; j
<= server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]; j++) {
if (removeID
== (server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][j]
- 1)) {
IsIn = true;
break;
}
}
} else {
IsIn = true;
}
if (IsIn == false) {
sendMessage(
“You cannot sell " + GetItemName(removeID)
+ " in this store.”);
} else {
int ShopValue = (int) Math.floor(
GetItemShopValue(removeID, 1, removeSlot));
String ShopAdd = “”;

                    if (ShopValue <= 1) {
                        ShopValue = (int) Math.floor(
                                GetItemShopValue(removeID, 0, removeSlot));
                    }
                    if (ShopValue >= 1000 && ShopValue < 1000000) {
                        ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000) + "K)";
                    } else if (ShopValue >= 1000000) {
                        ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000000) + " million)";
                    }
                    sendMessage(
                            GetItemName(removeID) + ": shop will buy for "
                            + ShopValue + " coins" + ShopAdd);
                }
            }
        } else if (interfaceID == 3900) { // Show value to buy items
            int ShopValue = (int) Math.floor(
                    GetItemShopValue(removeID, 0, removeSlot));
            String ShopAdd = "";

            if (ShopValue <= 1) {
                ShopValue = (int) Math.floor(
                        GetItemShopValue(removeID, 0, removeSlot));
            }
            if (ShopValue >= 1000 && ShopValue < 1000000) {
                ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000) + "K)";
            } else if (ShopValue >= 1000000) {
                ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000000) + " million)";
            }
            sendMessage(
                    GetItemName(removeID) + ": currently costs " + ShopValue
                    + " coins" + ShopAdd);
        }[/code]

Only part I changed in Client.Java

No compiler errors either.

If you can’t figure it out I guess I can revert to my backup. It’s a few days old though

Read full topic
